name.ja: ダークマター・レクイエム

summoning_condition.en: You can Summon this card by Contact Fusion (Fusion Summon it by shuffling the above face-up monsters from your field into the owner's Deck as material).

requirement.en: During your Main Phase that you Special Summoned this card.

effect.en: Change 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field to face-down Defense Position. This turn, this card gains 1300 ATK, and if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference).
